values: SO Saturday was prom right?? OMG did I have some fun... My date was my ex's sister... who just happens to be my best friend... I had a blast!! http://maggamuffin19.tripod.com/senior_prom_2005/  theres SOME pics gotta get more!

The Darkest Of Days

The withering pieces on the floor
Are fading memories of the one I adore
A vast ocean of guilt and misery
Longing for dreams that will never be
Hopeless and lost as I blindly stumble
Through every word you spoke, only a mumble
The seas no longer crest upon my shore
And my heart will know warmth nevermore
As cold as the day that you left me there
With broken dreams I could never share
My efforts were many and results so few
For the rest of my life I will dream of you
In the end I will pause at Heaven's gate
And ask the angels why I deserved this fate
As I walk across the clouds you'll know my pain
On the darkest of days some will think it is rain

OMG its been while since I wrote in here GOD guys I am so so sorry... been really really super busy!
So last Thursday we went to New York City for the "North American Music Festival" it was so great, well minus the 6 cases of food Poisioning me being one! Yeah that was loverly... Port A ended up taking fisrt in EVERYTHING yes everything! It was so amazing.... I got to accept 2 og the 8 awards....

THEN Sunday came... I got hime and I called Liz because shes my bestest and I missed her so so so much... we were talking then her Bro and I start talking....ON THE PHONE!!! I was like OMG!... Well Wednesday I went up there to go 4 wheeling... well he took me for a ride and well I kissed him... I couldn't help it I just did... it was so amazing!! THe kind of kiss where nothing else mattered... we were the only ppl left in the world kind of kiss.....But I have no idea what he thinks about it... and it kinda scares me... BOy what a week for me!

I love you! I know it may seem strange to start a letter off with that, but what else could I say. You make my world shine with the smile of your face. I would never leave you. You are like a bird in my nice tall tree. I love you so much and why is this love we have is everlasting. It will stay for the whole world to see what love really is. Honey, I love you with all my heart, soul, and life.Please listen to what I need to tell you. Even if you really don't care for me, even if you'll probably never notice me, there's something that tells me when I'm looking at you we are on this planet to be together, forever. And dear, trust me, I will do anything so that we can really be together, forever. Don't you ever realize that when I see you, two hearts in my eyes reveal my pure feelings for you, when our two bodies brush against each other, I'm feeling even more in love with you, when I see your two mysterious eyes, I always want to admit to you everything you make me feel? Not a living soul will ever be able to make me forget you. This letter represents what I've always wanted to tell you, but I'll probably never give it to you... I know that we've been through some pretty weird times, and are totally different people. But somehow we liked each other alot...and I still like you even though we aren't together anymore. Our insecurities and fear of rejection have put us to this. But I just want you to know, when I went out with you I don't know what I found in you that I loved so much. The only thing I could think of was that out of everyone in the world, you were the only one I wanted to be held by, and you were the only one I wanted to kiss, and for me, that was more than enough. A place for you remains in my heart, I am just writing to tell you how sorry I am that we are fighting. I know that what I did was wrong, and I am so sorry. I promise that if you give me one more chance, I will never hurt you again, and I will stay with you forever. You are the one person who has always loved me and supported me, and I hurt you. I just had no respect. I cannot tell you enough times that I am sorry, because I love you and I regret my actions 100 times a day. You are so precious; I could never live without you near me. I promise that from now on I will be the best girlfriend you could ever have and I will make you proud to say you are mine. Please forgive me.....
Do you remember the first day we met? You were wearing that smile that lights up a room. I ask you this question because a lot of things flashed before my face this morning. As usual, I kissed your picture good-bye and headed for school. When I opened the door, the cold, brisk, lonesome air hit me in the face. I tried to wrap myself up, but I could still feel the lonliness around me. I remembered how you wrapped your arms around me, and I could smell the sweet smell of your cologne through your jacket. I wish those days were still here.

So Tuesday was my Birthday , fun fun wow... I didn't really do anything. I went to Liz's yeah it was pretty fun... kinda disappointed because Martin didn't tell me Happy Brthday thats all I really wanted for it.....But yeah no such luck. My dad sent me flowers to school and they were OMG beautiful.... I cried and everything. Anyways back to Liz , we went tanning and I didn't really get any darker but I guess I gotta go more often huh? Well then we went back to her house we kinda goofed aroud. We also watched a movied that I made... it was cute.. untill I found out picture in there that I didnt know about... I wanted to shoot myself... Then yesterday I got sick yeah that sucked... my life is just a iving hell... and right now all I want is to get laid! *SIGH*

What the hell was I thinking?? Why did I think everything was gonna be better between Martin and I?? Friday was so OMG amazing and I thought things would be ok between us because we had such a great talk....and I thought we had everything worked out.. I know we arent dateing but you don't do shit lkike we did for no reason ... He totally BLEW ME OFF!!! like he didnt even look at me!! What the hell did I do?? I hate everything , SOrry I thought you could actully like someone like me...FOrgot I wasnt good enough anymore..

SO yesterday was kinda a shitty day, I woke up not really feeling the greatest something didn't feel right, Then comes homeroom Mr. Roae comes and tells me that I didn't make softball.... I woroked my ass off for nothing, I got bruises, my muscles hurt for absoultly nothing! WONDERFUL!! So I was feeling pretty shitty about that, then first period I forgot to do my sonet, then all of a sudden there was a tornado drill, sowe had to go stand in the hallway and face the lockers, the fun part about that was I was standing next to Deigo, he had me laughing so hard then we got introuble because we were SUPPOSE to be taking it SERIOUSLY! well I have a hard time believeing theres gonna be a torrnado in the middle of winter, make it a little more believeable, haha anyways, then I went about my day, Second period I went to voice class and Mr. Myers gave me a FREE showcase ticket..which to me was a smack in the face becasue I  couldn't make show chior, was in it from 7th to 9th and now all of a sudden I'm not good enough for it so I never went to watch it and he gives me the ticket.....but I accepted it with a smile and said thank you, I folded all the programs for it got MANY paper cuts....Then came lunch I saw Martin and was like hey didnt you forget something lastnight and hes like whaty? I was like how about telling Liz to call my mom...and hes like OMG I did..and I was like yeah thanks, I walked home....Then I just ignored him the rest of the day, cuz I donnoI just did, untill 8th he took a note to Liz for me, then I came home did some laundry with Ashley, and I decided to call Liz and see if she was still comming over , well I called and Martin answered the phone , and he talked to me for a half an hour, then hes like i'm gonna go for a 4 wheeler ride ill see you tonight and I was like yeah whatever and hes like ok.. see ya tonight Meg. So then I waited and Liz called and said she was on her way, well I went upstairs and I started to fall asleep, she came and her bro wasnt with her so I was like yeah I knew he wasnt comming. So we went to watch tv and the 10 mins later someone puls in and in walks Martin and liz was like got ya, well he sat on the couch and we threw socks at each other then he squeesed my wrist and it hurt :*( then I finnally took him upstairs to talk to him and we talked a lil then I was lkie here let me hugg you and we hugged and he held me tight and we stood there for 10 15 minutes like that and I kissed his cheeck and whispered I love you and he didnt say anything , then I looked at him and we kissed for a LONG time, and we sat on my bed and he layed down and pulled me down next to him rubbed my back and we just layed there and held each other,I said I love you again and hes like I know and I kinda looked at him and said you dont love me and I understand and he said no I do I just cant say it. So I really dont know whats gonna happen but I love the fact that he just held me . I told him I was sorry and he said so am I and I was like why are you sorry? You didnt screw up this whole relationship I did and I was starting to cry when I was talking and he just pulled me in to him and hugged me. I miss him so very much and I hope we can work things out.

I'm So Sorry
 
I'm so very, very sorry
What a stupid thing to say
I truly did not mean it
But my hurt got in the way

Before I knew it, out it came
I was angry and upset
I wanted you to feel as bad
And not let you forget

It is as if we play a game
And test each other's limit
We push and push and then one snaps
There is no sense within it

We need each other very much
Our hearts are still unbroken
I only wish we could stop and think
Before these words are spoken

Forgive me for the hurt I've caused
My ways I'll try to mend
You are to me a gift from God
My lover, my best friend.
Another chance

I'll never jeopardize your heart,
For my love for you is invincible.
Why you think I could delibrately hurt you;
I do not understand.
But I want you to know that :
I'll never do anything to hurt you again.
I am sorry if I hurt you.
Just give me another chance,
And you'll know how much I care.
I'm sorry for everything

I'm sorry you had to sit with me,
When my tears just kept falling.
I'm sorry you had to deal with me,
And all the problems following.
I'm sorry you had to hear me cry.
Now I'm stuck here drowning.

I'm sorry you have to be around me,
When I know you wanna leave.
I'm sorry you have to deal with
Everything about me.
I'm sorry you don't love me,
But I do love you.

I'm sorry I can't be perfect.
I'm sorry I was never good enough.
I'm sorry I can't be with you.
I'm sorry I love you.
But most of all,
I'm sorry for being me.

 

Accept my apology

I know I have hurt you.
I know have done so many things tobreak your heart.
I know I've made you cry.
But please forgive me.
God forgives you your sins,
so forgive me mine against you.
No matther what I did to hurt you,
This apology is from deep inside my heart.
Accept my apology!

 


I love you.
 
I'm Sorry

I know what I said hurt you bad,
but the intention was not to leave you feeling sad.
I was upset because you still kept her letters,
when in a few months we will be wed and take on life together.

I never ever want to share your love,
b'coz to me you're a blessing from above.
For all the times I hurt you bad,
said things to you when I was mad.

I would like to say I'm Sorry Sweetheart,
I will try changing not just my view point but also my heart.
For I now realise the importance of trust,
and shouldn't let happy times fly away like dust.

Gimme a chance, just one last time,
I will stand besides you through rough tides.
Never ceasing my love for you,
Loving you like you would always want me to.

 
the love is real

The love is real
And still is 
We fight and make up
That's what makes relasionship long
Though,sometimes
Been sorry may not be enough
But there's nothing to say
Than"I'm sorry".
 

My True Apology For My Baby

I know I've hurt you

I know I've made you cry

I wish I could change what I have done

Baby I regret it everyday

I know you are tired of hearing what I got to say

But baby I am truly sorry, will you please take me back?

I've learned my lesson

I know you think I hurt you on purpose, but baby I was foolish

I love you and only you so please let's get it together

Because you are my present and my future

You are truly a gift from God

I apologize my love, please accept my apology.

If I could only get you alone I would tell you this.....
I never ment to hurt you in anyway....and I am so sorry that what I said caused you pain! I know you cared about me more then anything and I know that what I said was wrong, I didn't even think about it, people say things that they don't mean out of anger,(like how Liz says she hates your mom when she really dosen't). I feel like I lost the greatest thing in my life and I hate that feeling ....and to know that I hurt you is killing me.... I know I can't change what has happened...and a lot has happened between us a lot bad and I don't like that either...I f I could take back what I said I would and if I could go back in time and prevent this all from happening I would....I can't stand the fact that we don't talk...I don't know what to say I don't know what to do, I don't know if it really even matters to you, but it really bothers me.....We don't talk , we don't touch ,We don't even look at each other when we pass in the halls...you use to give me a smile or say see ya or hey...and I miss that...I just want you to know YES I KNOW YOU CARED AND I LOVE YOU MORE THEN LIFE AND ALWAYS WILL

Senior Year of High School 

What year was it?
2004-2005

What were your three favorite bands?
STAIND!! and I like country(Sappy Love songs)

What was your favorite outfit?
Jeans and a tee

What was up with your hair?
Kinda long and BLONDE NOW!!

Who were your best friends?
Liz, Lacee, Megan Major

What did you do after school?
Oh Softball is starting... I have the musicals and whatever music stuff that I was in
Did you take the bus?
Yup!! 

Who did you have a crush on?
Just Martin (my baby since 9th grade)

Did you fight with your parents?
My mom my dad ...deployed
Who did you have a CELEBRITY crush on?
Orlando Bloom

Did you smoke cigarettes?
NOPE!

Did you lug all of your books around in your backpack all day because you were too nervous to find your locker?
Nope- we weren't allowed to have backpacks. But I definatly lived at my locker
Did you have a 'clique'?
Usually Liz ash Lacee and I

Did you have "The Max" like Zach, Kelly and Slater?
FOx's count??

Admit it, were you popular?
Umm....Kinda...a lot of people know me and talk to me...popular with the little kids because of Peer Helping .....I'm just friends with everyone
Who did you want to be just like?
skinny pretty girls
What did you want to be when you grew up?
tall

Where did you think you'd be at the age you are now?
ummm.....

I know doing this isn't really helping me out much but to actully put it all down is making my mind ease up.... Other then actully being with him...haveing him say my name and that i am his girlfriend theres a lot I miss... how he would give me a lil smile in the hall when we passed each other... the lil kisses after votech before I went to class... his hugs... most of all I miss him lying next to me... the sound of his heart beat that made me sleep....the way he played with my hair....and how he ran his fingers up and down my arm... and when he hugged me he played with my back.....
 i miss the kisses on my nose....and forhead... and the hand squeezes....and how he use to tell me he loved me really really or a million sweedinsh fish,....or how he would smile at me when we wanted something....and how when I would get hurt I would make a sad face and he would just start to smile and suddenly I forgot I got hurt.....and how he use to keep me warm when I got cold..and how he would give me his jacket to make sure I didn't get the slightest shiver,,,,How he use to sing to me...and he never picked on me for being short... said i was perfect...and he never judged me I know I am fat but he never said i was...and always told me I was smartter then I let people think... and that I didnt give myself enough credit...and how he was there for me when I had a bad day... called me after football and work even though he was tired just so I could hear his voice before I went to bed and I could hear I love you... and how he called during a storm beacuse he knew i didnt like them...how he was there for me when my dad left.. left me cry for it.. and when my sister was sick how he just l=ayed there and held me and let me cry while he said it was going to be alright... and he was there for me...nothing was gonna happen....I miss everything about you...I just want you to know... I never ever said I didn't care about you I would never do it because I could never not care about you... and I love you more then my own Life...

Yeah so yesterday was snowball... it was a lot of fun.... we had a pretty good turn out....    It took forever to decorate though,I spent 3 hours workin on the back drop for pictures... and everything... it was insane... I was so tired... then I almost fell asleep when Ash was doing my hair.... I loved it just wish I could have went with Martin!

Well Nothing really new and exciting happened today.. I was a kinda ehhhh day.... It's so ungodly cold...and I'm getting ready to go shopping with Liz...we gotta get stuff for tomorrow!!!  Tomorrow is a LONG ass day for me... I have to get around and go decorate for the Snowball Dance (Our Winter Formal) then I have to come home get a shower get dressed(yeah I'm wearing a dress big shock I know) and get my make up and hair done...then go to Liz's get her then prolly some pictures....then come here meety my date guess who?? Nope sorry not Martin :( but Lacee!!! its gonna be a lot of fun....I'm looking on the bright side of everything... We're gonna dance a bit... then I gotta announce the girls on court... then dance MORE.... then were gonna come home and Watch movies ALL NIGHT!!!! We're gonna have a GIRLS NIGHT!!! It's gonna be so so much fun... I can't wait... finally a night out with my girls ... I need a night... I can't stand being around here...DEPRESSED as HELL... It's my mom and Dads anniversary...and she has to spend it without him and shes kinda bummin....he sent her ROSES!!! awww it was so cute...she cried.....and the are so pretty... 3 red ones for us kids then 2 white for marriage and a yellow one for his deployment..... I wish I had someone like that who loved me for me and wanted to get me stuff not because they had to because they wanted to... I miss getting buttercups and I love you a million sweedish fishes and all that....*SiGh!* thems were the good old days...but now I have to get ready to leave!

Slept in my makeup
Didn't get my teeth brushed
I crashed on the couch
And now my mouth tastes like yesterday's news
Well hello Jim Beam
Oh the places you've seen
If only you could talk 
You'd tell me why he walked out on me and you

Oh the things lovers do when it's over
Oh the things lovers do when it's done
Find a cool bottle or a warm shoulder
Wake up older 
And try to move on

I drove around last night
Thinkin' 'bout our last fight
I cruised by your house
And all the lights were out and you were gone
So I found me a stranger
Well theres comfort in danger
But I thought about you 
The whole time we were gettin' it on

Oh the things lovers do when it's over
Oh the things lovers do when it's done
Find a cool bottle or a warm shoulder
Wake up older 
And try to move on

Wake up older
Wake up older

Slept in my makeup
Didn't get my teeth brushed
I crashed on the couch and now my mouth tastes like
Yesterday's news
 Boy I think she sums that one up well..... Stuff has gotten strange between me and Martin.... I went up there lastnight to go sled ridding with his sister and I havent been up there since we broke up...(3 months) well His dad and I have this thing where hed ask if I missed him and I would tell him yeah.. well lastnight he asked and I felt akward telling him yeah because YEAH I DID!! DUH!! Anyways... Bud(martin) was ridding the snowmobile...I wanted to go for a ride but I was too affraid to ask him....So Liz was like I'll ask him... well I guess he said yeah... but Liz said Go... and I figured she was saying it to him because he gets pissy about me....But she was talking to me...I missed my chance...but I didnt know how I was gonna take it,.... Like should I hang on...hang on a lil or hang on as tight as I could.... WHY AM I SO DUMB??? Maybe I should give up on him or what?? I don't know....Why can't everything get better... Not really getting worse or maybe it is and I m just to blind to get it....or I don't want to see it...

Nothing really new has gone on in my life missin everyone I use to hang out with missin my dad missin Cody(R.I.P.) Just nothing has really gone GREAT for me seems like everything in my life messes up. My world is crumbleing before me and theres nothing I can do about it, I try to smile but its really hard when all I want to do is cry I wish everything would just go away I want to be normal again. I miss "US' I miss ME! Why cant we just let us be us again? I cant take the hateing each other.

Yup its been a lil while since Iwrote in here and boy do i have a lot to say.... Yes I have wasted in a sense a lot of my life on Martin...but love makes you do funny things..... But all those things I ever did with him I would never take back... I loved every minet of them and I think that if we never happened I really wouldnt be who I am today....Everyone needs to experience new things and he was my new thing and it was fun!!

SO its 2005 ... means only a few more months till I graduate...and a few more months till I start College... and Iam out on my own starting my new life..its kinda scary but I am ready....though its not the same without my dad being here to see me off to college or to see me walk across the stage to get a hand shake and a piece of cardboard with my name written on it in pretty writting. I'm kinda gonna miss everything that happened in 2004! THeres a lot that took place in my life... My dad came home for not even 2 months and he had to leave again.. Martin and I were together 3 yrs and we broke up...then got back together now broke up again...I really don't know if we will get back together this time.. I really hope so..but I guess time will tell...We went to Chicago and took Superior in Chours and Chamber Singers... The Spring Musical was GREAT!! That wasalot of fun.. long hard practice nights...but it was well worth it..MY LAST Wintersongs concert...MY LAST Broadway Dinner Theater performance...I've done a lot ofLasts in 2004 but I can't wait for all my FIRSTS in 2005!! I'm ready for what the world can send my way... NYC here we come formy LAST TIME but I will make it as great as MY FIRST! ....

Ok.. Here goes.. Martin and I are done ..and i have a headache...
Grewat huh yeah I thought so too... DUH it FUCKIN SUCKS!! My Life fuckin SUCKS!

Well the newest thing is I SCREWED UP THINGS with martin... I got pissed at him and said things that I shouldn't have... I hate how you say things you don't mean out of aanger and it hurts so bad and you can't take it back... If I could I would take back everything horribale thing I said to you..... I LOVE YOU BABY and I m so sorry.....

Hehehe Hey guys sorry I know its been awhile since I wrote in this bad boy lol....anyways a bunch has gone on... Lets see Martin and I are at 2 months Tuesday and still goin good... My dad was home for 3 weeks! OMG that was awesome!! He went to see me perform at dinner theater...and he gave me flowers when I was done and it made me cry....I had Thanksgiving at Martin's... that was a lot of fun... his uncle kept picking on me because I wasnt hungry so he kept putting food on my plate when I wasnt looking...then Bud(Martin) andI went to watch the game and we ended up goofing off and I kicked his butt hes such a weenie when it comes to tickle fights!!! WOOHOO!!! LOL lets see what else??? I donno but whne I think of it I'll let yall know!!

Ok.. its the day after homecoming and boy was it an Event... the day started off as I woke up a lil late and I was running around like crazy because I had to go with my bestfriend to get her hair done.... When we got there I stayed in the car with my boyfriend and eventully fell asleep.... We get to the parade a lil late but we made it in time to get on the float and ready to go....We road in the parade and did our thing threw candy waved said hello and did some dancin as well... oh Sorry to the kid I hit in the head with  a gumball it wasnt intentinal......We roda to the back parking lot... almost fell off many many times!! We get there and Liz has on my boyfriends jersey(her bro) and we get some looks from some players... I think they thought she was on the team.... We walked around the track and looked at everything.....I sat with Martin's family...and then I got a phone call I had to go get my hair done .. I was so so sad...because i wanted to watch the game... but as I was getting my hair done I was listening to the game on the raido....THANK GOD WE WON!!!!!  I get home and then its crunch time gotta get everything ready and attepmt to get dressed with out messing up my hair... Boy was that a trip...

SO then we all pile in the cars and head for the dance lol we were "FASHIONABLY LATE" its was great... I got a lot of looks when I showed up with someone other then my boyfreind...but hey its ok .. We had fun danceing.. then we all went back to my house...Chilled watched movies fell asleep... It was interesting... Can't wait for this weekend... HALLOWEEN PARTY!!!  Oh hey its COLD in my house.....

WHat a day this was.... Its Hoomecoming Eve(lol I made that up myself!!) anyways we had to dress up in Orange and Black today for Spirit day... Well SIX of us crazy SENIORS spelled out G-A-T-O-R-S  well I was the T it was great.... We had the Pep rally and turns out the Football players had to do a cheer it was great seeing my boyfriend out there doing a toe touch....HAHAH.....BUT then I came home all excited to show the tape to my mom but no one was here the cars were here but no one else was... I waited a hoalf hour.. then I called my Grama Nancy.. Well she told me they had to take Ashley(my sister) to Guysinger... Scared the crap out of me...So i was in a panic..  I went upstairs and then my hunny comes and... we were lying on my bed and we got to talking about Ashley and how I wish it was me in all this pain instead of her she has enough goin on and he reasured me saying she will be ok and I just layed there and Sobbed...and I'm glad he is sympatheic he let me cry on him and he hld me.. then I find out HIS sister my best friend had to go to the hospital.. because she got stabbed at work... so i had too call the hospital and tell them shes on her way... she had to get a tetnis shot... I was sad... iits been one hell of a night.... then Martin danced with me because he wont be able to go to Homecoming because he ahs to work.. so we danced...! I love my baby....

You're a mermaid. The stereotypical mermaid had a
long, fish-like tail that blended with the
human torso at the hips and almost white skin
with red hair or some off color like green or
blue. They were the most fantastic singers and
the siren type of mermaids would lure sailors
with their lovely lullaby into dangerous rocks.
They were mostly harmless and peacefull and
they were content to simply sit on the beach
combing their hair or in the water playing with
friends. They never wore clothes and were
always women. They were sweet and a little
deciteful at times. (If you cannot see the
picture, go to my userpage and look near the
bottom. There should be the picture and
description for all the results)

Lets see.. Lots has happened since my last posting.... Martin and I are back together... ive been partying.. and My dad comes home in 17 yes 17 days!! Its great... my life is finally getting back to normal!! I cant wait! I love you Hunny!

Yeah so I'm a lil late writting in here.. But Tuesday I was suspended from school right well no big deal it was well worth it... I got to sleep in and shit I was enjoying it... I went to see my mom took 4 showers(something thhe kid I beat up needs to think about)it was an awesome day... I forgot to add some memories in my last enrty... No one will ever forget the feeling of being in a new place for the first time and hopeing you get excepted....My first time working for camp jj I was scared shitless...but soon I got to talking to people and learned i'm not different from them at all.. the only way I was , was not being born in the U.S. and they excepted me for it they wanted to know all they could about life outside this country...and as the years went on I continued to go back...Only because your camp friends are kinda different from you everyday friends.. they tought me that hey its cool for guys to wear dresses!! And how much fun it is to play a role in the Weekly talent show.. not everyone gets to be part of the cookie show (HOLA TO THE CREW!!) And I also learned how to make a mountain pie and what one was(sorry no girl scout skills) ... my most valuable lesson was the circle of trust... it feels good to be involved in one of the greatest bunches of girls and people I have ever spent a week of my life with ... and its cool to know Im not the only girl who dosent know how to build a fire!! 
And in making camp friends who knew that one special girl who turned out to be one of my best friends..Her dad knows my dad (uh oh!) lol.... She taught me wonders.. how to piss your ex-boyfriend off! How to take Jello like a man... that swimming at 230 in the moring is well DUMB!! , and that no matter how hard you think you have it theres someone just like you or worse who has been wating for someone like you to talk to about it.... Learned that wearing an Otto Eldred jersey at the Big 30 caused some grief(DUH we're all on the same team!!).. and that sleeping in is a WONDERFUL thing after a hard night.. and we can fit 7 people in one bed and still have room to be comfortable..And ALSO never to share a bed with Shane.. he stabs you in the eye!!But the are totally oblivious to the game Bullshit and how Chris and I cheated SO BAD!! hey we still got out!! So its not cheating its moving ahead , in an unfair way!And I learned that no matter how down or ready to die I am.. she will be there to help me or die along with me...(not thatIm gonna hurt myself chill people)All my O-E peeps Love yas.....And other memories are of my Cos chicas!! I miss you girls oh so much... Can't believe i'm not there to CHEER yous...But I'm there in sPiRiT!! Everytime you hear my Immortal think of me cuz I'm somewhere singing lol!! How wonderful were the years we spent .. from One Buffalo trip to the Next... how many times did I lose my privaliges?? lol did it affect me in anyway...ummm nope not really!! Yelling at the teacher.. Christmas parties.. Fun DAY!! Oh Rock on girls you guys kick!! And last but not least Martin.. I know I mentioned you in the first one but I remembered more things.. We didn't really have a PERFECT realationship...but i wouldn't change any of it.. you taught me that its ok to be affraid , but I knew no matter what you wouldn't let anything happen to me, and that you don't have to be a size 2 to be pretty.. you liked me for me...you also taught me that syrup DOSE come from trees(sorry I didnt know) and that cows wont hurt me ( the babys at least) You made me feel like a princess.. you called me after football...when you knew you had to get ready for work.. and you called me after work when I knew all you wanted to do was sleep because you had a rough day but you still called.... And you came to spend the weekends with me unless i was up there and we spent every min we could together... and I learned that you were the best thing that ever happened to me.. I don't think I would be this way if we never happened.. and for everything youve done and give and taught me thank you so very much.. its something I will cherrish and adore forever...Who knows maybe someday you will come back to me.. but untill that day i am glad we are still friends atleastYou've played an important role in mylife.. and I don't want to lose it or you.

You know Life is what you want it to be life is what you make it.. and I know lately I've been nothing but stressed out .. and I got to thinking My life is actully wonderful... Nothing can ever replace all the things I've found out through my years like Friends come from many places and each one is different in their own way.. they taught me things thatI will remember for the rest of my life like.. blue frosting makes an interesting conversation piece 2 yrs down the road or that celing fans have their own launage..and Cake fights rock!! And how calling GHOASTBUSTERS isn't a really good idea.. you get some strange guy yelling at you in a funky language...And who knew that still playing dress up is fun or that lipstick makkes neat hair ccolor but is hard to was out...and that maybe haveing your friends do your make up isnt always a smart idea..and who knew tampons make great people and a great gift when they are people...or that people drift apart but always find their way back....
You always make new friends and they teach you things like cows aren't as bad as you think or swimming at 1130 is a lil too cold for normal people.. or that driving a 4 wheeler isnt as hard as it looks its sometimes harder..And they are always up to get in to trouble or do dumb stuff with you like go to Sheetz and buy blue condoms just because its fun.. or pretend to be hurt just so they could ride around in the electric carts at Walmart...Or play tooth fairies and get stupid pictures taken...
Not only do you make friends.. but you also find that special someone..someone who shows you who you are.. and if isnt able to show you helps you find youreself.. or someone who will call you during a thumderstorm because they know you're scared of them.. or calls you afterwork just to make sure you know they love you and just to hear you tell them you love them before they go to bed...or is there for you when your cat dies..or gets you a new cat because they want you to be happy..or feels really bad they didnt talk to you much the day of your annavisary and comes to see you that night afterwork with a handful of your favorite flowers.... Then you know this person is really special.. It's taken me a while to figure this out but if it wasnt for my friends or family or the love of my life I wouldnt be whoI am now.. So all I have to say to you guys is.. I LOVE YOU!! YOU MEAN EVERYTIHING TO ME!!

I just got back Saturday Night from a week long camp working with Childern with Specail needs, call Camp JJ Ive been working there for 6 years and boy this year was something else...

It all started out as normal only I was 3 hours early..strange because Im never on time(all thoughs who know me will tell ya)I get there and me and my friend shawn help set up the lodge and get things ready.. then Rachel asks me to Do Counselor check in ...as I sit there some people start to come in some I knew some I didnt..

When camp Finally started a few of the counselors i got to know changed my life forever you may seem to be someone you really arent... I never thought I would see tough guys break down to be so tender and loveing and when things were at their worst ( convict escapeing) the guys all wanted a piece of him! I just want to say thank you everyon for a GREAT WEEK!
